survey_name: Employee Engagement and Workplace Culture Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to measure employee engagement levels and assess workplace culture within the organization to identify areas for improvement and foster a positive work environment.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current role at the company?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure the scale is balanced with clear labels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current role at the company?

questions.question_text: Which of the following best describes your relationship with your direct supervisor?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale for consistency. Avoid leading questions.

script.question_text: Which of the following best describes your relationship with your direct supervisor?

questions.question_text: How often do you feel recognized for your contributions at work?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point frequency scale. Ensure options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How often do you feel recognized for your contributions at work?

questions.question_text: Which of the following benefits are most important to you? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Use multi-choice format. Include an 'Other' option for flexibility.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkbox (multi-choice). Add an open-text field if 'Other' is selected.

script.question_text: Which of the following benefits are most important to you? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: What is one thing the company could do to improve workplace culture?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Keep it concise.

script.question_text: What is one thing the company could do to improve workplace culture?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this company as a great place to work to friends or family?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. This is a key metric for employee advocacy.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this company as a great place to work to friends or family?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the company's communication regarding organizational changes?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale. Ensure clarity in the question wording.

script.question_text: How would you rate the company's communication regarding organizational changes?

questions.question_text: Do you have the necessary tools and resources to perform your job effectively?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point frequency scale. This helps identify resource gaps.

script.question_text: Do you have the necessary tools and resources to perform your job effectively?

questions.question_text: How often do you participate in team-building or social activities organized by the company?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point frequency scale. This measures engagement in company culture.

script.question_text: How often do you participate in team-building or social activities organized by the company?

questions.question_text: What additional comments or suggestions do you have regarding employee engagement or workplace culture?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture any additional feedback. Keep optional.

script.question_text: What additional comments or suggestions do you have regarding employee engagement or workplace culture?
